gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: NSF/NCAR C-130 Aerosol in-situ scattering and absorption
NSF/NCAR C-130 Aerosol in-situ scattering and absorption

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Deptartment of Oceanography University of Hawaii at Manoa 1000 Pope Road Marine Sciences Building 502B
University of Hawaii Department Ocean 1000 Pope Rd

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The ACE-ASIA Aircraft: C-130 Aerosol in-situ scattering and absorption, coarse/fine, RH-dependence (T.Anderson/Masonis) data are available online. This aerosol optical data were acquired on board the NCAR C-130 aircraft during the intensive fiend phase of the ACE-Asia field project (March 30 2001 to May 04 2001).
